# Error Patterns & Fixes

> Persistent memory for errors encountered, their root causes, and verified fixes.
> **You can edit this file directly** â€” add known issues, correct agent entries, or remove resolved ones.
> Agents will check this before debugging to avoid re-discovering known issues.
